TopicTitle: FuelDrain issue - how to reproduce it

Articles.Content: Hi, the problem is related to rover wheels. i have tested it. i've made a rover with small wheel and attached it with a stack separator to a rocket i've started to remove piece by piece until i found that the fuel drain started to execute when there was remaining a rover wheel with 2 small cube structures. last things was the rover was attached to a stack separator inside of a small cylindrical cargo
Also happens with certain landing legs and sometimes fairings
